name: YOU ARE NOT A LOAN!
description:
Play as a college student that moved to Detroit because of crippling student debt, only this Detroit isn't a normal place, it is a purgatory where strange monsters try to steal your limbs and citizens trade organs to survive. (based off of real images of Detroit of course)

(Yes, practically unfinished game but I wish to expand on what I've created so feedback on things that do work would be quite helpful)

CONTROLS:

WASD - movement

SPACE  - jump

ESC - Inventory

F - Interact

LEFT CLICK - shoot left weapon

RIGHT CLICK - shoot right weapon

Q - pick up left weapon

E - pick up right weapon
